listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny rescues a mysterious boy who harbors a dark secret, but may also know the way out of the Badlands.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter II: Fist Like a Bullet
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: M.K. finds refuge in an unlikely and dangerous place, while Sunny's loyalty is tested when Quinn tries to force him to commit an unspeakable act.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter III: White Stork Spreads Wings
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: As Sunny begins to train M.K., the boy struggles to learn discipline. Meanwhile, Quinn seeks retribution against The Widow and faces the consequences.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter IV: Two Tigers Subdue Dragons
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny and M.K. try to figure out how to control the boy's power, while Quinn sets a dangerous parlay with a rival Baron to help fight The Widow.
As Sunny secures his escape from the Fort, Quinn grows suspicious, while The Widow's decisions set her on a collision course with Sunny and M.K.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter VI: Hand of Five Poisons
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny and M.K. fight to escape Quinn's grip once and for all, while the Baron's enemies conspire to take him down and change the Badlands forever.
Six months after the Season 1 finale, Sunny finds a new foe, as well as a new, unexpected ally, while MK learns about his gift in a mysterious place.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter VIII: Force of Eagle's Claw
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: While Sunny and Bajie struggle to stay alive, The Widow faces challenges as she consolidates her power, and MK discovers secrets about his past.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter IX: Red Sun, Silver Moon
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny and Bajie meet a dangerous foe who knows Sunny; the Widow prepares for a showdown; MK learns a secret.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter X: Palm of the Iron Fox
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: The Widow's fight for power puts her in an epic showdown with her enemies who have joined forces against her, while an old threat resurfaces.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter XI: Monkey Leaps Through Mist
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny and Bajie get help from an unlikely source, but it comes with a price. The Widow considers a risky gambit, while MK enacts a dangerous plan.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter XII: Leopard Stalks in Snow
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny and Bajie encounter and unexpected friend but also an unbeatable enemy from the past. The Widow makes an unholy alliance.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter XIII: Black Heart, White Mountain
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny struggles with his inner demons and his friends cannot find a way to help him. Meanwhile, the Widow has a deadly new partner who helps her extract revenge on her enemies.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter XIV: Sting of the Scorpion's Tail
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny plays a dangerous game causing his allies to question his loyalties. The Widow finds a new weapon as her alliance begins to disintegrate.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter XV: Nightingale Sings No More
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny gets help from an unlikely source to defeat a common enemy. Bajie uncovers a shocking secret from his past.

listOfEpisodes.episodeName: Chapter XVI: Wolf's Breath, Dragon Fire
listOfEpisodes.episodePlot: Sunny faces the toughest challenge of his life. Bajie's loyalties are tested.

name: Into the Badlands
plot: A mighty warrior and a young boy search for enlightenment in a ruthless territory controlled by feudal barons.
